recommended_sap_solutions.core_erp: SAP S/4HANA Cloud (public or private edition)
recommended_sap_solutions.industry_solution: SAP S/4HANA for Retail/Wholesale or SAP Business Suite for Retail

modules.name: Finance (FI) and Controlling (CO)
modules.description: This module provides integrated financial and management accounting across the enterprise.  SAP S/4HANA Finance delivers a universal journal that brings financial and management accounting data into a single in‑memory table, enabling real‑time financial processes and reporting【792485720505845†L243-L249】.  Features include real‑time financial processing, a simplified financial data model, integrated cash management, planning and forecasting, compliance reporting and predictive analytics【792485720505845†L243-L284】.  Controlling supports cost element and cost center accounting, activity‑based costing and profitability analysis for branch‑level performance management【792485720505845†L243-L284】.

modules.name: Sales and Distribution (SD)
modules.description: SD manages the order‑to‑cash cycle, including sales orders, pricing, shipping, billing and returns.  In SAP S/4HANA the SD module offers a simplified data model and advanced order processing, supports real‑time inventory management and ATP checks, and includes enhanced pricing and rebate management capabilities【792485720505845†L378-L412】.  Rebate agreements are handled through condition contract management in settlement management, allowing both customer and supplier rebates with accruals and settlement calendars【567539685567561†L146-L167】.  SD will address the client’s purchasing rebate requirement by enabling contract‑based rebate processing and credit memo settlements【567539685567561†L146-L170】.

modules.name: Materials Management (MM) & Procurement
modules.description: This module handles procurement and inventory management across branches.  SAP IS Retail’s merchandise management capabilities include centralized and decentralized procurement, inventory tracking, price and markdown planning and promotion management【664210519189648†L121-L129】.  Procurement and inventory management streamlines purchase orders, manages deliveries and monitors inventory levels, integrating with vendors to ensure timely replenishment and reduce stock‑outs【664210519189648†L130-L134】.  MM also supports goods receipt and inbound delivery processes (e.g., MIGO and VL31n) which can be performed via Fiori apps【500677157832387†L181-L214】.

modules.name: Warehouse Management and Logistics
modules.description: Warehouse management covers stock transfer, goods movements and warehouse operations.  Fiori inventory management apps allow workers to post goods receipts, view stock information, perform stock transfers and track transfers directly from mobile devices in real‑time【500677157832387†L257-L276】.  Real‑time postings and minimal paperwork reduce errors and improve inventory accuracy【500677157832387†L267-L276】.

modules.name: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) & Customer Experience
modules.description: SAP S/4HANA and IS Retail include CRM functionality for customer engagement, loyalty management, promotions and omnichannel commerce.  CRM integrates with sales, marketing and service functions to support personalized promotions and seamless customer experiences across physical and digital channels【664210519189648†L174-L190】.

modules.name: Merchandise and Assortment Management (Retail)
modules.description: This retail‑specific module manages article master data, assortments and listings, price management and promotions.  In SAP IS Retail, master data includes article, site, vendor and customer information and controls which products are sold at which sites【664210519189648†L110-L119】.  Merchandise management supports centralized procurement, inventory tracking, price/markdown planning and promotion management【664210519189648†L121-L128】.  Assortment planning allows products to be allocated to branches and seasons【664210519189648†L150-L154】.

modules.name: Human Capital Management (HCM) / SuccessFactors
modules.description: HCM manages employee data, payroll, time tracking and statutory compliance.  It supports statutory calendars, holiday schedules and workforce management at each branch.  Integration with Finance ensures that payroll and personnel expenses flow into the universal journal for accurate financial reporting【792485720505845†L243-L284】.

modules.name: Analytics & Reporting
modules.description: SAP S/4HANA includes embedded analytics and SAP Analytics Cloud for reporting across sales, inventory, finance and customer data.  Built‑in BI tools in SAP IS Retail support sales performance analysis, inventory turnover analysis, customer behavior insights and predictive demand forecasting【664210519189648†L165-L173】.  These analytics are AI‑powered and operate in real time thanks to the HANA platform【792485720505845†L243-L284】.

pc_and_mobile_solutions.pc: SAP GUI and SAP Fiori Launchpad provide desktop access to all modules via browsers or the SAP GUI.

mobile_apps.name: SAP Direct Store Delivery (DSD)
mobile_apps.description: A mobile app for sales representatives delivering goods directly to customer stores.  It manages order capture, route planning, delivery confirmation and settlement, bypassing the central warehouse.  This is useful for the distributor site and branch deliveries.

mobile_apps.name: SAP Fiori Inventory Management Apps
mobile_apps.description: A suite of Fiori apps for mobile devices that allow store associates to post goods receipts, view stock information and perform stock transfers.  Workers on the ground can work directly with these apps without paperwork; postings are done in real time, information is always up to date and the apps run on any modern device【500677157832387†L267-L274】.
features: Post Goods Receipt: record goods received from suppliers on purchase orders or inbound deliveries【500677157832387†L181-L214】
Stock Information: display stock levels down to storage bin level【500677157832387†L226-L232】
Stock Transfer: track transfers within the warehouse, produce balance‑sheet transfers and handle special stock postings【500677157832387†L233-L254】

mobile_apps.name: Store Merchandise & Inventory Management (Fiori)
mobile_apps.description: Role‑based Fiori apps for store merchandise and inventory management allow store associates to access back‑end data, improve transaction speed, enable customer service and perform inventory management on desktops, laptops and mobile devices.  Permanent connectivity ensures real‑time access to product and inventory data across locations【53405681716273†screenshot】.
features: Assign associates to store, order products, receive products, transfer stock and manage stock movements

implementation_considerations: Define the enterprise structure in SAP to represent the six branches, including two main branches and one distributor site.  Configure each branch as a plant and assign storage locations, sales organizations and profit centers accordingly.

Activate settlement management (condition contract management) for purchasing rebates and configure rebate condition types, accruals and settlement calendars to handle supplier rebates【567539685567561†L161-L170】.

Set up fiscal year variants and statutory calendars to meet HR and finance compliance requirements.  Ensure that statutory holidays and payroll periods for each branch are maintained in the HR system.
Integrate CRM and omnichannel commerce with inventory and finance modules to provide a unified customer experience across branches and the distributor.
Enable Fiori and mobile apps for inventory and store operations so that branch workers can manage goods receipts, stock transfers and stock visibility on mobile devices【500677157832387†L267-L276】.
expected_benefits: End‑to‑end integration of procurement, inventory, sales, finance and HR processes across all branches and the distributor.
Real‑time visibility into stock levels, sales and financials, enabling informed decision‑making and improved profitability【664210519189648†L174-L190】.
Streamlined rebate processing through condition contract management, allowing accurate accruals and timely settlements with suppliers and customers【567539685567561†L161-L170】.
Enhanced inventory accuracy and reduced paperwork by equipping store associates with mobile Fiori apps for goods receipts and stock transfers【500677157832387†L267-L276】.
Compliance with statutory calendars and local regulations through integrated HR and finance modules, while supporting branch‑level reporting and profitability analysis.
